languages.text: "Да охранит их души в посмертии Крадущийся меж звезд".
"May the Wolf That Stalks Between Stars keep their departed souls."

languages.text: “愿逐星凶狼庇佑她们逝去的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "May the Wolf That Stalks Between Stars keep their departed souls."

traits.locale_text: “愿逐星凶狼庇佑她们逝去的灵魂。”

languages.text: « Que le Loup qui Chasse entre les Étoiles protège leur âme. »
languages.original_text: "May the Wolf That Stalks Between Stars keep their departed souls."

traits.locale_text: « Que le Loup qui Chasse entre les Étoiles protège leur âme. »
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: 「星々を渡る狼が彼女たちの亡き魂を守ってくれることを祈ろう」
languages.original_text: "May the Wolf That Stalks Between Stars keep their departed souls."

traits.locale_text: 「星々を渡る狼が彼女たちの亡き魂を守ってくれることを祈ろう」
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: «Que el Lobo que Acecha entre las Estrellas guarde sus almas fenecidas».
languages.original_text: "May the Wolf That Stalks Between Stars keep their departed souls."

traits.locale_text: «Que el Lobo que Acecha entre las Estrellas guarde sus almas fenecidas».
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Melee

languages.text: "Möge der Wolf auf Sternenpirsch ihre verschiedenen Seelen hüten."
languages.original_text: "May the Wolf That Stalks Between Stars keep their departed souls."

languages.text: "Yıldızları Gözleyen Kurt, aramızdan ayrılan ruhlarına önderlik etsin."
languages.original_text: "May the Wolf That Stalks Between Stars keep their departed souls."
